metadata.synopsis: Default dialog of Marcus, the tadpoled Flaming Fist spy tasked by Ketheric with abducting Isobel. Marcus is outside Isobel's room when this dialog plays and he tries to convince the player to join him in kidnapping isobel. Can lead to combat or alliance.
metadata.how_to_trigger: After the checkpoint, the FlamingSpy is in Isobel's room. Player can talk to him before the dialog HAV_DefeatingKetheric_BriefAtLake is triggered.

20.speaker: Fist Marcus
20.context: InternalNodeContext: Skip first part of dialogue if it's already been done.

21.speaker: Fist Marcus
21.text: It's time. Let's go get Isobel.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Starts mind meld at end of node.NodeContext: Said knowingly, with maybe a wry sarcastic touch. They don't really know each other, but he pretended to to get you off the hook with Jaheira.

31.speaker: Fist Marcus
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Starts mind meld at end of node.NodeContext: Said knowingly, with maybe a wry sarcastic touch. They don't really know each other, but he pretended to to get you off the hook with Jaheira.

50.speaker: Fist Marcus
50.text: My old friend. Very good to see you again.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Starts mind meld at end of node.NodeContext: Said knowingly, with maybe a wry sarcastic touch. They don't really know each other, but he pretended to to get you off the hook with Jaheira.

83.speaker: Fist Marcus
83.text: Clever ruse showing off your little 'artefact'. Jaheira was all too eager to believe you.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I've been told to capture Isobel.

70.speaker: Fist Marcus
70.text: So the General got tired of waiting for me to deliver. No matter. I don't mind sharing the glory.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Thanks for your help with Jaheira.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus trying to telepathically probe the player's mind through mindmeld

78.speaker: Player
78.text: It was no ruse. The object protects me from the Absolute's influence.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus trying to telepathically probe the player's mind through mindmeld

14.speaker: Fist Marcus
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus trying to telepathically probe the player's mind through mindmeld

30.speaker: Narrator
30.text: *The soldier tries to force his way into your mind, searching for answers.*
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marcus trying to telepathically probe the player's mind through mindmeld

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Allow him to see what he wants to see: you were lying about the artefact.
16.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

86.speaker: Fist Marcus
86.text: This is no time for petty jokes.
86.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

5.speaker: Fist Marcus
5.text: This is no time for petty jokes.
5.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

26.speaker: Fist Marcus
26.text: I have orders from General Thorm in Moonrise Towers. We can work together. I don't mind sharing the Absolute's glory.
26.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

52.speaker: Narrator
52.text: *This man takes orders from General Thorm, helping him may be just what you need to gain deeper access to the cult.*
52.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Good - because I've been tasked with capturing Isobel.
38.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

6.speaker: Player
6.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

67.speaker: Fist Marcus
67.text: Ruin this mission, and the General will take your head.

40.speaker: Player
40.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

35.speaker: Fist Marcus
35.text: Isobel - the Selûnite cleric that guards this place. General Thorm wants her alive.
35.context: NodeContext: His eyes flicker out towards the door that leads to the lake.

36.speaker: Player
36.context: NodeContext: Nods behind him, toward balcony door.

48.speaker: Fist Marcus
48.text: She's out there now - doing her moon magic and what-have-you. Keeps the curse away from the inn.
48.context: NodeContext: Nods behind him, toward balcony door.

32.speaker: Fist Marcus
32.text: Without her, everyone here - everyone scheming against General Ketheric - is done for.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: She's supposed to be captured, not killed?
8.context: NodeContext: A bit hasty, quick to correct the player.

42.speaker: Fist Marcus
42.text: Aye. I hope she'll see reason, but if that fails, I'll have to initiate more... extreme measures. And I'll expect your help in the fight.
42.context: NodeContext: A bit hasty, quick to correct the player.

13.speaker: Player
13.context: NodeContext: The Flaming Fist steps forward, getting in the player's personal space, tense and wary.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Sounds like this is your fight, not mine.
66.context: NodeContext: The Flaming Fist steps forward, getting in the player's personal space, tense and wary.

34.speaker: Fist Marcus
34.text: When Ketheric Thorm speaks, we all listen.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I can take the cleric myself.
65.context: NodeContext: The Flaming Fist steps forward, getting in the player's personal space, tense and wary.

17.speaker: Fist Marcus
17.text: I won't waste time in a petty tug-of-war. We'll do this together. We've got the cleric alone. Now's the time.
17.context: NodeContext: The Flaming Fist steps forward, getting in the player's personal space, tense and wary.

85.speaker: Fist Marcus
85.text: Isobel's on the balcony - should be nearly done with her prayers. Let's go say hello.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Thanks for the information. I'll take your guts now.

82.speaker: Fist Marcus
82.text: You're just like the others. While the Absolute wages the war of wars, Her faithful waste time fighting each other.

3.speaker: Fist Marcus
3.text: I would have shared the glory of this mission with you. But maybe it's my destiny to take it for myself.

77.speaker: Fist Marcus
77.text: The General speaks for the Absolute. And I don't question the Absolute.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: If the Absolute needs a cleric of Selûne, I'm right here.

1.speaker: Fist Marcus
1.text: My instructions are clear: bring her. Not you.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: I've heard enough - whatever your mission, it ends here.

58.speaker: Fist Marcus
58.text: You'll help me, or you'll stay out of my way.

18.speaker: Fist Marcus
18.text: So much good work undone by petty squabbling among the faithful. You underestimate what true faith can do.

53.text: You've had the weapon this entire time. You're no True Soul. You're a traitor!
53.context: NodeContext: Breaks mindmeld to speak openly.

55.speaker: Fist Marcus
55.text: You've had the weapon this entire time. You're no True Soul. You're a traitor!
55.context: NodeContext: Breaks mindmeld to speak openly.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Block him out: your mind is opaque.

11.text: Enough games. We have other business here.

51.speaker: Fist Marcus
51.text: Enough games. We have other business here.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: Show him the truth: the artefact does what you say it does.

27.text: That's... that's the weapon the Absolute has been searching for. You're not one of us. You're an abomination.

19.speaker: Fist Marcus
19.text: That's... that's the weapon the Absolute has been searching for. You're not one of us. You're an abomination.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: Are we the only True Souls in this place?

54.speaker: Fist Marcus
54.text: I suppose General Thorm sent you to help with my mission. That's all right. I don't mind sharing the glory.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: What are the Flaming Fist doing here?

73.speaker: Fist Marcus
73.text: Working with the Counsellor to find their wayward Grand Duke Ravengard. He's been taken to Moonrise Towers.

15.speaker: Fist Marcus
15.text: But that's not my problem. The Absolute chose me to bring glory to this place. The General must have sent you, too.

24.speaker: Fist Marcus
24.text: I don't mind sharing the rewards.

47.speaker: Fist Marcus
47.text: Glad to see you earned Jaheira's trust. That's no mean feat.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Your vouching for me certainly helped. Thank you.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Everyone believes what they most want to hear.

23.speaker: Fist Marcus
23.text: Lucky for you. And perhaps for me.
